title: FS: Old Mill Ty Cobb Red Portrait PENDING/ON HOLD
author: jamest206

posts.post_title: FS: Old Mill Ty Cobb Red Portrait PENDING/ON HOLD
posts.post_content:
Graded PSA 2.5   No creases.  Nice Color, decent centering. Nice Registration

Taking offers, and will give a discount if payment method isn’t a headache

 Will ship FedEx 2nd Day signature required

Feel free to email me at [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you in advance! And I might add, in person it is a VERY BEAUTIFUL CARD!

Alright everyone, I have to move on this card and some others by the end of this weekend. Again, I have a bottom line on this card, based on all recent sales, and the back of this card as well as how the front looks and what is being asked on here AND EBay. The front quality on this is very good, so is the back and it being Old Mill.

 Would love to get this shipped out FedEx TODAY or MONDAY!!!!! Listening to offers, as I missed out on something I needed from Heritage. 

Feel free to email me or text at 719-757-0008.  Look at what I am asking above, and do the math on what eBay takes as a cut or consigning and make an offer. Listening to them all today!
I'm interested in this but can I see a scan of the whole card/case, including the flip?
New Photos, as requested. Beautiful card!!!! I will text or email as many pictures as necessary as well!!!!
Listening to all reasonable offers.  Thanks! Would love to get this shipped out either today or tomorrow. I am in Colorado, and FedEx picks up at 4.30 daily!

It is Wednesday. Make me an offer. If you don’t like what I’m asking-make me an offer.  I have got to move on this card. Maybe even make an offer- and I may accept.   I have a bottom line and at the same time know this cards worth.  Text or email me.   [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url] or 719-757-0008  Unless a miracle happens and I can ship today would love to ship tomorrow or have the right deal in place
Alright.   Asking $10,600 for this.   Feel free to contact me.
One week left, and then I will be putting it up for consignment.

One more attempt to sell this and ship no later than Thursday. I’ll cover shipping via FedEx. $10,100.  After Thursday it’s off the market.   Thanks everyone for the interest in this card.  Feel free to text or email me.

Last day on the market. There will be no consignment of this in the future either, will only listen to cash PLUS trade deals after today, and will not be selling for straight cash moving forward.  Appreciate all the interest.
Also, will listen to any offer at 9k or above. Payment method can be discussed, and will ship FedEx as stated on my initial post.
Alright.   After talking to a couple people, figured I would ask $8800 over the weekend and see how it goes for the weekend
